meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring in the evening.
meanings.sent1: The vespers sky was painted in beautiful hues as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a peaceful walk in the vespers hours of the day.
meanings.sent3: The vespers breeze whispered secrets to the night.
meanings.sent4: The vespers shadows danced playfully on the walls.
meanings.sent5: The vespers glow cast a warm light over the landscape.

meanings.definition: A service held in the evening in some Christian churches.
meanings.sent1: The vespers at the church were a time of reflection and prayer.
meanings.sent2: Many people attended the vespers to seek solace and peace.
meanings.sent3: During the vespers, the choir sang with angelic voices.
meanings.sent4: The vespers candles flickered gently, illuminating the sanctuary.
meanings.sent5: The vespers bells rang out, calling the faithful to worship.
